attributes.action: Government action, not just rhetoric, on reducing energy price increases.
attributes.additional_details:
On E.ON EnergyPlan
your new tariff	
Electricity £465.90 for 12 months	
Based on your new tariff. Includes your discounts and VAT at 5%	
On E.ON Energy Fixed 1 Year v19
your current tariff	
Electricity £347.27 for 12 months	
Based on your current tariff. Includes your discounts and VAT at 5%
attributes.background: E-On have just asked me to pay 34% more next year. £347/year (now) to £466/year. USwitch's best offer is a 14.3% increase with an unknown supplier; with more established companies seeking at least 30% more. Is this fair? I think not! Inflation is running at 1.6% (December 2016). Greed - I think so!

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182823
